price: 你说：“任何人不能保护我不受安拉的惩罚；除他外，我绝不能发现任何避难所。
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَن يُجِيرَنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٞ وَلَنۡ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلۡتَحَدًا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: qul innī lan yujīranī mina al-lahi aḥadun walan ajida min dūnihi mul'taḥadan
